alert.note: Alert for Garfield; Loup; Wheeler (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 01 at 6:21AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 AM CDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of north central Nebraska, including the following counties, Garfield, Loup and Wheeler. * WHEN...Until 1115 AM CDT. * IMPACTS...Rises in small streams including Cedar Creek and Dry Cedar Creek. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 619 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This is causing small stream flooding. Between 1.5 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. - Cedar Creek and Dry Cedar Creek are the most likely places to experience minor flooding. This includes the following streams and drainages... Dry Cedar Creek, Gravel Creek, Haskell Creek, Cedar River, Cedar Creek, Bean Creek, Little Cedar Creek, North Loup River and Big Cedar Creek. Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Gables, Deverre and Carson Lake. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
